alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 4:58PM MDT until October 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM MDT SUNDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning on Sunday, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory today, west to southwest winds will taper off through the evening with gusts of 25 to 40 mph still possible. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Quay County, Eastern San Miguel County, Far Northeast Highlands and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Quay County
